missionProperties.startingObjective: Lose less than 5 supply caches (&Caches destroyed& caches destroyed).
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent supply caches. An Imperial figure can attack a supply cache (Health: *2*, Defense: {G} equal to the number of adjacent Rebel figures).
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassible terrain.
{-} Doors are locked. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-} The Empire receives the first activation each round.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when 5 supply caches are destroyed, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You arrive at a Rebel safe house where crucial supplies are being stored. You've been there a few minutes when the door explodes inward. Imperials rush in, and blaster fire fills the air.

{-} Rebel figures can deploy to any empty spaces.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent supply caches. An Imperial figure can attack a supply cache (Health: *2*, Defense: {G} equal to the number of adjacent Rebel figures).
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassible terrain.
{-} Doors are locked. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-} The Empire receives the first activation each round.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when 5 supply caches are destroyed, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText: Imperial figures only target supply caches when there are fewer than 3 Rebel figures adjacent to them. Otherwise, they target the closest healthy Rebel or the closest door.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The Imperial troops are few in number but persistent. Still, as you thin their ranks and defend the supplies, other Rebel forces respond to defend the area. With a few barked commands from their leader, the attackers disengage .

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Their work complete, the assault squad slips out of the safe house. With nothing left to defend, you chase after them to no avail. Their transport is away before you can even fire a single shot.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Door West
globalEvents.eventText: After a few targeted shots by the Imperial soldiers, the door collapses.

entityProperties.name: Door West
entityProperties.theText:
A door keeps you from being targetet by the Imperials and allows you to fire through slits.

Doors are locked. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block his movement or line of sight.

globalEvents.name: Leave no Survivors
globalEvents.eventText: Striding through the blasted-open entrance is a Royal Guard in black armor with red trim. Since you don't often hear of these guards in non-defensive operations, you assume this individual is someone special.

enemyGroupData.customText: {-} Immediately perform a second activation, starting from the top of the instruction list again. Limit once per activation.

globalEvents.name: Artillery Support 1
globalEvents.eventText:
Artillery fire rains down upon the safehouse.

Choose the space with the most Rebel figures within 3 spaces, then roll 1 red die. Each figure within 3 spaces of the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

globalEvents.name: Artillery Support 2
globalEvents.eventText:
Artillery fire rains down upon the safehouse.

Choose the space with the most Rebel figures within 3 spaces. Each figure within 3 spaces of the chosen space tests {K}. Each figure who fails is <color="red">Stunned</color>.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Cache 1
globalEvents.eventText: Under the Imperial fire, the cache goes up in flames.

entityProperties.name: Supply Cache 1
entityProperties.theText:
A supply cache filled with equipment and rations.

An Imperial figure can attack a supply cache (Health: *2*, Defense: {G} equal to the number of adjacent Rebel figures).

globalEvents.name: Reminder
globalEvents.eventText:
The Imperial forces surge forward.

The Empire has the first activation in this round.
